info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 6:31PM EDT until July 12 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL WINDHAM AND TOLLAND COUNTIES... At 630 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Stafford, or 9 miles northeast of Vernon, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 605 PM, amateur radio reported multiple trees down in Longmeadow, MA. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Mansfield, Southbridge, Ellington, Tolland, Coventry, Stafford, Somers, Dudley, Thompson, Brooklyn, Woodstock, Willington, Canterbury, Ashford, Pomfret, Chaplin, Hampton, Eastford and Union. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
